name: stench
short_effect: Has a 10% chance of making target Pokémon flinch with each hit.

flavor_text.sun-moon: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: By releasing stench when attacking, this Pokémon may cause the target to flinch.
